name: Maurizio Binetti
subtitle: Product Marketing Manager | Medtech & Healthcare | Neuroscience | Medtronic
about: Effective and dynamic marketing leader with a solid scientific background and extensive experience in the healthcare market across sales and marketing departments. My driving motivation stems from investing myself fully in meaningful positions where I can make a major impact on improving the quality of patients' lives. In my current job, I accomplish this goal by bringing innovation at Medtronic through strategic thinking and execution of high-quality projects for active implantable devices and patient facing digital solutions.
experiences:
Leading strategic marketing, commercial strategy and digital initiatives for Pain Therapies, a business unit part of the bigger Neuroscience Area:
• responsible for recent launches of newest multiple technologies for chronic pain management based on active implantable devices and patient facing digital solutions
• leading omnichannel marketing and awareness campaigns aiming at developing consistent patient pathways toward specific Centers of Excellence for Neuromodulation treatments
• implementing of innovative business model, such as development of value and outcome-based healthcare to maximize market opportunities in synergy with contract & operations
• driving portfolio prioritization processes and support HQ Marketing Team in decision making of R&D investment

Member of the Product and Portfolio team of Spinal Surgery, part of the Restorative Therapies Group (RTG) of Medtronic:
• driving marketing strategies for Spine and Pain Therapies navigating across the organizational matrix
• responsible for new product launches for cervical spine and minimal invasive technologies such us Baloon Kyphoplastic (BKP)
• supporting KOLs management through international tailored educational plans
• supporting strategic portfolio management
• technical support in operating room

Full commercial accountability for assigned territories (Northern Italy). Generating demand and maximizing implantable spinal devices awareness by working and providing with education to healthcare professionals and administrators

Member of the RPL marketing team, in charge of creating marketing tools and supporting application training on the field. Providing the sales team and customers with continuous application training on STAGO product line.

Scientific Project: “Positional identity and neurogenic properties analysis of neural stem cells”.
The study was developed at the Stem Cell Biology and Pharmacology of Neurodegenerative Disease Institute of Milan. Main areas of interest:
• Stem Cell Biology
• Molecular Biotechnology
• Neuroscience
• Medical Pathology
